message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the remaining 10%. Hope you'll accept!
You took 90% last time, now it's my turn to make a counteroffer. I'll give you 20% this time, but I'm hoping you'll be more generous next time.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40. This time I'm keeping a little more, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement that benefits us both in the long run.
I'm starting to think we're not going to reach an agreement. I'll meet you halfway this time, but I'm not sure how much longer I can keep playing this game with the money losing value.
